Articles.Content: the dates for your palms start from your EBOR. Mine was in march, to 6 months=2 palms I could have had 1 more, but no time.

Eligable merit badge wise, i think more than 2, but i get one every 3 months, that's 20 palms if i work hard.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-21T15:23:14Z" title="10/21/2015 03:23  PM" data-short="8 yr">October 21, 2015</time> by Kozak**

> 
> Eligable merit badge wise, i think more than 2, but i get one every 3 months, that's 20 palms if i work hard.

You can do it! Pets is an easy badge to get. Look for ones that you have already completed requirements for.
Life, almost Eagle, 25 merit badges, and a Brotherhood OA member. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

I would like to add stuff: NYLT (National Youth Leadership Training) OA, Oakleaf (leadership training), Eagle palm (one as of now, about to earn a bunch more, over the course of 4 years ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P") ), being the youngest person to earn eagle in my troops history. I could go on but i dont wanna brag too much ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
oof! Nearly forgot about this thread! Will update as soon as possible. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Guess what! Doing my Eagle Project tomorrow! I've nearly ran out of time, I only have until April 15th to get everything done! But I'm working super fast and super hard, all should work out. Wish me luck!
Great! I'm almost Life. Almost...

I'm afraid I'll have to steal most recent Eagle. I made Eagle this last December. I did my OA ordeal and I also will have the Triple Crown if I ever fill out the form for it...

Nice to see a lot of other Scouts on here.

I've also done NYLT, 27 merit badges, 100 nights of camping, 173 backpacking miles, and 63.5 hiking miles, over the 4 in a half years I was with the troop )In Washington state)

They were REALLY active! Check out the website to see for yourself: [http://troop-1539.org/](http://troop-1539.org/)
We got it done! Project is done, working on paperwork now. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
What did you do for your project? And congratulations!

Oh, also, I'm now in a patrol called "The Krakens" ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Congrats! I haven't been able to even start mine since I moved cross country back in January, and I have no idea what I'm going to do.

And btw, I'm not on the list. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

[@legoclone09](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/142607-legoclone09/), I had to do a rush project, so we painted the walls inside a community service center.

[@Spaceception](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/152800-spaceception/), I will update the list as soon as I can. Today is actually my birthday, so it probably won't happen today. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

My board of review is scheduled for the 27th. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

> On 5/27/2015 at 9:57 AM, Endersmens said:

> 
> My first badge was Space Exploration. (seriously) My last one was....well. my last 2 (got them at the same time) Were robotics and sailing.
> 

Space exploration was my 4th merit badge, I got it at summer camp, and it was what inspired me to take an interest in space exploration, my rocket I built flew twice, I would've done it again, but they said 2 max ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

My first was Art, I got that in 20 minutes ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")  My last (Not for long hopefully) was Dentistry.

> My first was Art, I got that in 20 minutes ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")  My last (Not for long hopefully) was Dentistry.
> 

Mine didn't fly. Mine used a C engine.  The instructors were like "that's not an engine! That's a shotgun shell!" And wouldn't let me launch so we didn't lose it in the trees somewhere. 

Funily enough, it was rated for 975ft, and they launched two B engines to 1125. ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif ":huh:") 

**Edited <time datetime="2016-04-15T22:11:01Z" title="04/15/2016 10:11  PM" data-short="8 yr">April 15, 2016</time> by Endersmens**

So, I've aged out, as of September. But I'm still semi-active now. Haven't been to a troop meeting a a while, but I am in touch with my SM, and applying for as many Scouting college scholarships as I can.

Also, [@Endersmens](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/80723-endersmens/), I'mma assume that this is your 18th. Happy Birthday! Your "rush" project is cool, but one of my old SMs like to tell the story about a Life Scout who had everything done except for the Hiking/Cycling/Swimming badge. On the day before his birthday, he came over and got ***all***  of the cycling requirements done in one day (including the 150 miles of cycling). I met the guy, and he's pretty cool, too.
Life scout working on Eagle and OA member.
Second Class ATM, nearly first

First class, almost Star

[@Dman979](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/123837-dman979/): become a merit badge counselor.  Stay active.

Wow. Lots of new scouts! I'll be working on the update now. I'm gonna stop with the profile links, since when you call out someone, like [@Dman979](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/123837-dman979/), you can click on the shoutout and it goes to their profile. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") So I'll just use that from now on. Now, to fix formatting...
